text: He's been drinking again and he locked me out of the apartment. I'm on the street corner and I'm so scared. His name is Mark. He told me he'd be waiting for me if I called the police. I don't know what to do.
I need to know if I can get a restraining order. My ex-partner, David, won't stop calling from 555-0199. He follows me home from my job at the downtown library. I have screenshots of the texts.
He has a gun and said he's coming over right now. My address is 123 Elm Street, please help me. My name is Jessica.
I feel so trapped. He controls all the bank accounts and took my card. I have no money for gas or food for my son. How do people even start over from this?
Is there anyone I can just talk to? I feel so alone in this. It's not violent right now but the things he says are just breaking me down. I feel worthless.

My ex, Vikram Singh, is stalking me. He waits outside my office in Bandra and sends emails from stalker_ex@email.com. He drives a silver car with the plate MH01AB1234. I'm afraid to go home. What are my legal options?
He's hurting me now. My name is Fatima. I'm at 42, Marine Drive, Mumbai. My phone is 9820098200. Please send help.
My husband, Rohan, took my debit card and refuses to let me access our joint account at HDFC Bank. I have no money for my daughter's school fees. What can I do?

Anjali here. I'm hiding in the bedroom. I can hear him breaking things in the living room. He's yelling that he's going to kill me. He's tried to choke me before. I'm so terrified he's going to break down the door.
I was wondering if you had any information about support groups in the Andheri area. I just need to find people who understand what this is like.

Has anyone else dealt with this? My boyfriend makes me send him pictures of where I am all the time. He calls it caring, but it feels controlling. If I'm 5 minutes late he calls my friends and my mom. It's so embarrassing.
I need a lawyer. My husband Sameer is threatening to take my kids and go back to his family in Delhi if I leave him. He says I have no rights. I live in Pune. My number is 9876543210.
I left him a week ago and I'm staying with my sister. But I feel so sad and empty. I miss him sometimes and then I feel stupid for it. Is this normal?
This is Priya. He pushed me down the stairs. I think my arm is broken. He's gone for now. I'm at 15/2, Koramangala, Bangalore. I'm too scared to call an ambulance.
My husband's name is Arjun Sharma. He has cameras all over our apartment in Chennai. I feel like I'm in a prison. Can he legally do that? Where is the privacy?
He always apologizes and says it won't happen again, and for a few weeks things are perfect. But then it always does. I feel like I'm going crazy. I love him but I hate this cycle.
Please help. I'm hiding in my car. He smashed my laptop and phone. I'm using a borrowed phone. I saw a knife in his bag. I'm near India Gate. His name is Karan.
I want to open a new bank account that my husband doesn't know about. He works for ICICI Bank, so I'm scared to go there. Can you suggest other options for me in Hyderabad?
I don't even know if this counts as abuse. He doesn't hit me, but he tells me I'm fat and stupid every day. He says no one else would ever want me. After a year of this, I'm starting to believe him.
My name is Aisha Khan. He's passed out drunk on the sofa. I want to leave with my son but our flat in Noida is locked from the outside. The key is in his pocket. What do I do?
My family keeps telling me to just be a better wife and that it's my fault he gets angry. I have no one to turn to. They live in Kolkata and they don't see what happens.
I have an appointment with a lawyer tomorrow at the district court in Saket. My husband found out and said 'there will be consequences' if I go. I'm scared. My name is Neha.
Can you just confirm the address for the women's shelter in Juhu? I need to give it to a taxi driver. I don't want to say it out loud.
He's threatening to post private pictures of me online if I break up with him. I feel sick to my stomach. Is this illegal? What can I do to stop him?
My landlord, Mr. Gupta, saw my bruises and gave me an eviction notice. He said he doesn't want 'drama' in his building. I have nowhere to go. I live at C-4, Vasant Kunj.

He's outside my window right now. I have a restraining order against him but he doesn't care. His name is Aditya Verma. The police are on their way but I'm so scared. My address is 21B, Park Street, Kolkata.
He makes me write down everything I spend money on, down to a single rupee for a tea. I get an 'allowance' like a child. I have a master's degree but I haven't been allowed to work in years.
I'm calling from a hospital. My name is Sunita. He broke my ribs. The doctor is asking me questions and I'm afraid to tell the truth. My husband is waiting outside the door.
I'm pregnant and he pushed me yesterday after an argument. He cried and said he was just stressed about the baby. I'm scared for my child. Am I overreacting?
Can I file a police report anonymously? My brother-in-law is a police inspector in Jaipur and I'm afraid my husband will use his connections against me. My name is Meera.
What is financial abuse? I think my partner is doing it but I'm not sure. He puts all the bills in my name and then doesn't pay them, it's ruining my credit score.

He isolates me from my friends. If I go out for coffee with them, he accuses me of cheating and gives me the silent treatment for days. It's easier to just stay home now. I haven't seen my best friend in six months.

My son's teacher, Mrs. Desai at Podar School, called me today. She was concerned about bruises on his arms. I had to lie and say he fell. My husband gets angry at him, not just me. I need to get my son out of here.
I finally got a job offer! But my husband says I can't take it because I need to be home to cook for him. He's not forbidding me, just making me feel incredibly guilty. I don't know what to do.

I have a package of evidence (photos, recordings) saved in a Google Drive. I need to get it to a lawyer named Mr. Advani without my partner knowing. Can you help me contact him securely? My email is scared.jane@email.com.
He's on his way to my parents' house in Ahmedabad. He thinks I'm there. He has been drinking. Please warn them. Their number is 9898012345. My father's name is Suresh Patel.
For those who have left, how did you support yourself? I have no work experience for the last 10 years and no family to help. The financial fear is what's keeping me here.
My partner is tracking my location through my phone. I'm afraid to turn it off. I'm at the Starbucks in Connaught Place. I think he's nearby. My name is Riya.
He broke my grandmother's vase that she left me. He said it was an accident but he was smiling when he did it. It feels like he's trying to erase every part of me that isn't connected to him.
I need to go to the police station in Thane West. Can you tell me if there is a female officer I can speak to? I am scared to talk to a man about this. My name is Pooja.

He took my passport and my daughter's. We are supposed to fly to London next week to see my family. He said we are not going anywhere. I am a UK citizen. What can my embassy do to help? My name is Sophie.

It's my son's birthday tomorrow. His father (my ex) has threatened to show up and cause a scene. I have a restraining order. Should I call the police now as a warning, or wait and see if he actually shows up?
He just threw me and my dog out. I'm in a park in Chandigarh with my dog, Bruno. I won't go to a shelter that doesn't accept pets. Are there any pet-friendly options?

He checks my phone every night. Reads all my texts, even my conversations with my sister. I feel like I have no privacy, no space to be myself. I've started deleting everything but he gets angry about that too.
I'm on a bus to Lucknow to escape him. He doesn't know where I am. But I have no money and nowhere to go when I arrive. Can you help me find a safe place? My name is Shabana.
He's screaming at me right now in the car. He's driving really fast and recklessly on the highway. I'm afraid he's going to crash to punish me. I can see a sign for Panvel.
Has anyone successfully used the 'grey rock' method? I'm trying to become as uninteresting as possible so he'll leave me alone, but it's exhausting acting like a robot all the time.
I need information on filing for divorce in Kerala. The laws are different here, I think. My partner says he will leave me with nothing. My name is Lakshmi.

My friends are tired of hearing about it. They tell me to 'just leave' but they don't understand how complicated it is. I feel so judged and isolated from the people who are supposed to be my support system.
My son, aged 45, took my pension check. His name is Harish. I live with him in his house in Amritsar. I have no other family. He said I don't need money. What can I do?
My partner is non-binary and I am too. A lot of the resources I find are very focused on men abusing women. Does anyone know of any LGBTQ+ friendly support services?
He installed spyware on my phone. I know because a friend who works in IT told me. I can't delete it. He sees everything. My name is Kavita and I'm in Gurgaon.
My caregiver, a woman named Leela, won't give me my blood pressure medication unless I give her money. I am 82 and cannot get to the pharmacy myself. I am in South Delhi.
I'm a man being abused by my wife. I feel so ashamed and I'm scared no one will believe me if I report it. She hits me and tells me I'm not a real man.
My name is Balan. My partner threatened to 'out' me to my religious family if I ever leave him. I am from a small village in Tamil Nadu. This would destroy my life.
He threatened to hurt my cat if I didn't come home right away. I'm at my friend's place in Surat. The cat is still in the apartment with him. His name is Parag.
He's not a citizen and he always holds it over me. He says if I report him, he'll be deported and it will be my fault. I feel so responsible for him even though he's hurting me.
I'm disabled and use a wheelchair. My husband, Alok, often moves my chair just out of reach, leaving me stranded in a room for hours. It's his idea of a joke. I'm in Bhopal.
I need a therapist who understands narcissistic abuse. Can you recommend anyone in Mumbai? My name is Ishita. My number is 9988776655.
My in-laws live with us and they watch him verbally abuse me and do nothing. Sometimes they even join in and tell me I'm a bad wife. I feel like it's 3 against 1 in my own home.
He took out three credit cards in my name without me knowing. My Aadhaar number is 1234 5678 9012. Now collectors are calling me. My name is Divya and I'm in Nagpur.
After he hits me, he threatens to kill himself if I leave. He cries and says he can't live without me. It makes me feel so guilty, like I have to stay to save him.
I have an audio recording of him threatening me. Is that admissible in court in India? I live in Chandigarh. My lawyer's name is Ms. Kaur.
My partner, Sneha, is very respected in our community in Mysuru. She's a doctor. I'm afraid no one will believe she's abusive behind closed doors. She's a woman, and I am too.
He doesn't let me see a doctor alone. He always insists on coming into the exam room with me and answering the doctor's questions for me. I have bruises but I can't tell anyone.
He has a history of violence. His ex-wife, Reena, had a restraining order against him. He told me she was crazy. Now I see he is the problem. I'm in Jaipur.
How do I make a safety plan? I have two small kids. What do I pack? Where do I go? I feel so overwhelmed just thinking about the logistics of leaving.
My father-in-law, Ramesh Gupta, makes comments about my body and 'accidentally' touches me when no one is looking. My husband says I'm imagining it. We live in a joint family in Lucknow.
My partner is a police officer in Patna. He told me if I ever report him, he'll have me arrested on false charges. His name is Inspector Vijay Kumar.
He's so charming and wonderful in public. Everyone thinks he's the perfect husband. It makes me feel like I'm the crazy one. Does anyone else experience this Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde thing?
I need help. He's locked me in a room without food. I'm in a farmhouse outside of Nashik. My name is Gita. The nearest landmark is Sula Vineyards. My phone is about to die.
My partner, a man named Faisal, is withholding my HIV medication. He says I don't deserve it. I live in Mumbai. I need help getting my prescription.
He uses my religion against me. He tells me that I'm a bad Christian/Muslim/Hindu for wanting to leave my husband and that God will punish me. It's really messing with my faith.
My ex-boyfriend posted my phone number, 8877665544, on a public website with an ad for sexual services. I'm getting horrible calls. My name is Simran and I'm a student at DU.
He sleep deprives me. If we have a fight, he won't let me sleep all night. He'll just keep yelling at me until the sun comes up. I'm so exhausted I can't even think straight at my job.
I am a trans woman. My partner, Rakesh, constantly misgenders me and tells me I'll never be a 'real' woman. He says no one else would have me. I'm in Kolkata.
He has a gun collection. They are all licensed. But he cleans them in front of me whenever he's angry. He never points them at me, but it feels like a threat. My name is Preeti. We live in Dehradun.
I want to leave but we have a joint business together. My whole financial life is tied to him. How do I even begin to untangle that without ending up with nothing?
My son is being bullied at school because his friends overheard my husband yelling at me. The school counselor called. I'm so ashamed. My son's name is Aarav. We're in Chennai.
He put an AirTag in my car. I just found it under the seat. My name is Lavanya and I live in Pune. Will he be notified if I disable it? I'm scared he'll know that I know.
He keeps 'forgetting' to pick up my prescriptions from the pharmacy. I'm diabetic and I've missed doses. He says I'm being dramatic but I feel really sick. Is this medical neglect?
My ex, Ravi, keeps calling my boss at Infosys in Bangalore and telling them lies about me. I'm worried I'm going to get fired. My employee ID is 12345. What can I do?

Does anyone else's partner use their therapy language against them? He tells me I'm 'projecting' or 'gaslighting' him when I try to talk about my feelings. It makes me feel like I can't say anything right.
My brother, Ajay, is stealing from my elderly mother. She has dementia and he's been using her ATM card. She lives in an apartment in Jayanagar, Bangalore. I have bank statements as proof.
I'm a student at IIT Bombay. My boyfriend, who also goes here, slapped me. I don't want to go to the police, but is there a campus resource I can talk to confidentially? My name is Kriti.
He's constantly threatening to call child protective services and say I'm an unfit mother if I don't do what he wants. I'm a good mom, but the thought terrifies me. I have a record of his texts.
I'm in India on a spousal visa. My husband, Omar, took my BRP card and passport. He says he'll have me deported if I tell anyone about the abuse. I'm from the UK and I don't know the laws here.
He's never hit me, but he punches walls and breaks things when he's mad. The other day he threw a chair and it almost hit me. I'm scared one day his aim won't be off.
My ex created a fake social media profile using my pictures and name, and is posting horrible things. My name is Sonali Verma. Can I get the police to make him take it down? I live in Delhi.
He makes me give him all my passwords. Email, social media, everything. He says it's because he loves me and wants to protect me, but it feels like I have no secrets.
My son is failing school because he's so stressed from the fighting at home. His teacher at DPS Ruby Park in Kolkata wants a meeting. I don't know what to tell her. My husband's name is Tarun.
He's threatening to send intimate videos of me to my father, Ashok Kumar in Kanpur. I'm so scared of what my family will think. His number is 9123456789.
He is constantly in debt and borrows money from my parents, promising to pay them back. He never does. It's causing so much tension between me and my family.
I'm looking for a pro-bono lawyer in the Chennai area who can help me with a domestic violence case. I don't have any money. My name is Deepa.
He says things like 'If I can't have you, no one can.' He hasn't done anything yet, but it sounds like a threat. Am I right to be scared?
My partner, a woman named Maya, is emotionally abusive. I'm also a woman. I'm afraid people will take it less seriously. We live in Hyderabad. Are there LGBTQ-specific services?
He is forcing me to have another child when I don't want to. He has hidden my birth control pills. This is reproductive coercion, right? My name is Nandini, from Vadodara.
He's a heavy drinker. When he's drunk, he becomes a different person - mean and violent. When he's sober, he's sweet and apologetic. I keep hoping the sober person will win.
I'm a 17-year-old girl. My father, Mr. Joshi, hits me if I don't get good grades. My mom says it's for my own good. I live in Kota. Is there anyone I can report this to?
How do I document the abuse without him finding it? He goes through my phone and laptop. I need proof if I'm going to leave, but I'm scared of what will happen if he finds it.
My husband, a professor at JNU, belittles my intelligence in front of his academic friends. He tells them I'm 'simple' and 'uneducated' even though I have a degree. I'm so humiliated.
He showed up at my gym, Planet Fitness in Indiranagar. I don't know how he knew I was there. I have a restraining order. My name is Aishwarya. I'm hiding in the locker room.
He demands to know where I am and who I'm with every second of the day. If I don't answer a text within two minutes, he'll call me 20 times in a row. Is this jealousy or is it abuse?
My ex-husband, Sanjay, is refusing to pay child support. I have the court order. I can't afford rent this month. I'm in Noida. What's the fastest way to enforce the order?
I'm so scared of the court process. He has a fancy lawyer and I can't afford one. I'm worried the judge will believe all his lies and I'll lose my kids.
My name is Zara. My husband is trying to take a second wife without my consent, which is illegal. He and his family are pressuring me. We live in a Muslim community in Hyderabad.
He has never laid a hand on me, but the emotional abuse is so bad I have started having panic attacks. My doctor wants to put me on anxiety medication. I feel like I am losing my mind.
I just found a hidden camera in our bedroom. I feel so violated. I took it. What do I do now? My husband's name is Raj. We live at 12B, Lodhi Colony, Delhi.
He's threatening to tell my conservative parents that I'm not a virgin if I leave him. They would disown me. This secret is the only thing keeping me here.
I want to file for divorce on grounds of cruelty. I live in Mumbai. Can you explain what kind of evidence I would need to prove it? My name is Ananya.
He's waiting for me in the parking lot of my work at Wipro in Sarjapur, Bangalore. He's been texting me that he 'just wants to talk'. I'm too scared to go outside. My name is Shruti.
He uses my disability against me. He tells me that no one else would ever want me because I'm 'broken'. I use a cane to walk, and sometimes he hides it from me.
My ex keeps sending me unwanted gifts and food to my apartment in Powai via Zomato and Amazon. It feels like he's trying to show me he knows where I am. My name is Mehek.
He's threatening to harm himself with a knife if I call the police. He's locked us both in the apartment. We are at Flat 301, Prestige Towers, Gurgaon. My name is Pooja.
I finally left. I'm safe at a shelter. But now I'm overwhelmed with guilt. I keep thinking about the good times. Is this normal? Will this feeling go away?
I need to change my son's school to protect him from his father. What legal documents do I need to do that without my husband's consent? I'm in Pune. The lawyer I spoke to is Mr. Sharma.
He wants to have access to my location on Google Maps 'for safety'. He gets angry when I say no. It doesn't feel like it's about safety, it feels like it's about control.
My husband, Imran Khan, forced me to sign over my inheritance from my father. I was under duress. Is there any way to reverse this? I live in Lucknow.
He is constantly comparing me to his ex-wife. He tells me she was a better cook, she was cleaner, she was smarter. It makes me feel like I can never measure up.
He drove away with my 2-year-old daughter in the car after a fight. He won't answer his phone. His name is Nikhil and he drives a blue Maruti Swift, DL5CAB1234. I'm at home in Dwarka, Delhi.
I am a man being abused by my male partner. A lot of the language around this issue feels very gendered and it's hard to find stories I relate to. I feel completely alone.
My sister, Amrita, is being abused. I can see the bruises over video call. She lives in Agra and I'm in the US. She keeps making excuses for him. How can I help her from so far away?
I need help getting my belongings from the apartment I shared with him in Malad. I am afraid to go back alone. His name is Sameer. Can the police provide an escort?
He blames me for everything. If he has a bad day at work, it's my fault. If he gets a speeding ticket, it's my fault. I'm starting to feel like I am the source of all his problems.
My ex keeps calling me from unknown numbers. I block one, and he just calls from another. I've had 15 calls today. My name is Trisha. I'm at my office in Cyber City, Gurgaon.
I'm pregnant and he's threatening to claim the child isn't his if I leave. He says he'll demand a paternity test and humiliate me and my family.
My husband has a drinking problem. He was ordered by a court in Thane to attend AA meetings but he's not going. Is there a way I can report this? My name is Vaishali.
I have no money of my own. He gives me a weekly 'allowance' and I have to show him receipts for everything. I feel like a child. I want to get a job but he won't let me.

My mother-in-law, Mrs. Sharma, is the one causing problems. She tells my husband lies about me and encourages him to 'discipline' me. We live in a joint family in Varanasi. I feel completely powerless.

He has started asking for dowry, years after our marriage. He says his business is failing and my family needs to help. He's threatening to send me back to my parents in shame. What does the law say about this?
My husband, a man named Prakash, from Indore, uses our smart home devices to control my life. He turns off the lights when I'm reading or blasts music when I'm on a call. It feels crazy.

He keeps a detailed log of when I leave the house and when I come back. He asks for explanations for any deviation, even 10 minutes at the grocery store. I feel like I'm constantly being monitored and interrogated.
I work as a domestic helper in a home in South Delhi. The man of the house, Mr. Verma, is abusive. I am an undocumented worker, so I'm scared to go to the police. I'm afraid they will deport me.
My ex-partner created a deepfake video of me and is threatening to send it to my employer at Tata Steel in Jamshedpur. My name is Rina. I am sick with worry.
He uses my past trauma against me. He knows I have a history of anxiety, and he intentionally does things to trigger my panic attacks. Then he calls me 'crazy' and 'unstable'.
My name is Sandhya. My husband forged my signature on a loan document from Bajaj Finserv. Now I'm getting calls from debt collectors. His PAN card is ABCDE1234F. We live in Pune.
He gives me the silent treatment for weeks on end if I do something he doesn't like. It's like I don't exist. The loneliness is unbearable. I'd almost rather he yelled.

I'm part of a lower caste, and my husband's family constantly uses slurs and demeaning language towards me. My husband, Sunil, from a village near Jaipur, does nothing to stop them. Can I report this under the SC/ST Act?
My ex has been draining my bank account through UPI transfers. He knows my pin. I'm at the State Bank of India branch in Guwahati right now trying to freeze my account. My name is Bipasha.
He convinced me to quit my job and move to his city for him. Now that I'm completely dependent on him and isolated from my friends, the abuse has started. I feel so stupid and manipulated.
My partner is threatening to report me to the Foreigners' Registration Office with false information to get my visa cancelled. I am a student at the University of Hyderabad. My name is Chloe.
He's started to hurt our dog when he's angry at me. He'll kick him or lock him outside. I'm terrified for my dog's safety, and I feel like it's a warning to me.
I need help with a Section 498A filing. My lawyer says I need more evidence. What kind of proof is usually needed for mental cruelty? I am in Kolkata. My husband's name is Debashis.
He's very religious and uses scriptures to justify his control over me. He says a wife must be submissive and that I am sinning by questioning him. It's hard to argue against.

My stalker, someone named Alok, has started sending letters to my home address at 7, Salt Lake City, Kolkata. The letters are getting more graphic. I have a police report number, but they aren't doing anything.
I'm not allowed to have male friends. He gets furious if I even mention a male coworker's name. He accuses me of having an affair if I get a text from an unknown number.
My husband wants to move our family to Dubai. I know if I go, I will be completely isolated and have even fewer rights. He's trying to force me to go. My name is Farida. We are in Mumbai.

He has a temper. He was driving today and another car cut him off. He followed the car for 10 minutes, screaming and trying to run them off the road. It wasn't directed at me, but it terrified me. His name is Mohan.
He's started making me film our sexual encounters. He says it's just for us, but I'm so scared of what he'll do with the videos if I ever try to leave.
My son's school, the Doon School in Dehradun, has noticed his grades dropping and his aggressive behavior. It's because of the abuse he sees at home. The principal, Mr. Das, has requested a meeting.
He's 'love bombing' me again. I left last week, and now he's sending flowers, writing poems, promising he's changed. My head knows it's a trap, but my heart is so confused.
My landlord in Goa, Mr. Fernandes, is my abuser. He threatens to throw me out if I don't do what he wants. I'm a tourist and my visa is expiring. I have nowhere to go.
He's a pillar of the community, donates to charity, everyone loves him. It makes me feel like no one would ever believe me. I feel like I'm living a lie.
My husband is a well-known lawyer in Delhi, his name is Vivek Mehra. He's threatening to use his legal connections to make sure I get nothing in the divorce and lose custody of our daughter.
He's making me take medication I don't need. He says it's for my 'anxiety' but it just makes me feel groggy and unable to think. My name is Seema. I'm in a small town in Punjab.

Has anyone dealt with post-separation financial abuse? We're divorced, but he's intentionally delaying asset transfers and hiding money to make my life difficult. It feels like he's still controlling me.
My ex, Karan from Mumbai, has been spreading rumors about me in our friend group. He's trying to isolate me from my support system. Now my friends are taking his side. I'm so alone.
I can't afford to leave. I'm a stay-at-home mom with no recent work experience and no savings. The thought of being homeless with my kids is scarier than staying.
My partner tracks my spending on our joint credit card from Axis Bank. He questions every single purchase, even a coffee. My name is Anusha. He lives in Bangalore.
I'm a male victim of domestic abuse. My wife, Sheela, is the abuser. I need to find a shelter that accepts men. Are there any in the Pune area?
He's started to involve my oldest child in the abuse. He'll tell our son that 'mommy is crazy' or 'mommy is lying'. It's turning my own child against me. It's heartbreaking.
My husband, a politician in Lucknow, is using his public image to discredit me. He's telling the media I'm mentally unstable. My name is Priyanka Singh. I feel so trapped by his power.
He broke my glasses on purpose. I'm visually impaired and I can't see or work without them. Now I'm completely dependent on him to do anything. It feels calculated.
My ex, whose name is Ankit, is violating the restraining order. He's sending me messages through payment apps like Paytm and Google Pay, with abusive notes attached to 1 Rupee transfers.
He's at the door of my apartment, number 5A, in Salt Lake, Kolkata. He's been banging on it for an hour. The neighbors can hear. My name is Roshni. The police aren't coming.
He's 'jokingly' threatened to kill me so many times I don't even know if it's a joke anymore. He'll say things like 'I could strangle you right now and no one would know'. It's terrifying.
I'm looking for a trauma-informed therapist in the Bangalore area who speaks Tamil. Do you have any recommendations? My name is Selvi.
He's trying to get me fired. He found out where I work and has been sending anonymous emails to my HR department with lies about me. I'm scared I'm going to lose my job, which is my only way out.
My husband, Jaspreet Singh, is threatening to tell my family in Amritsar that I'm gay if I leave him. This would bring immense shame on my family. I'm in a lavender marriage and I feel so trapped.
I feel like I'm walking on eggshells all the time. I never know what will set him off. The constant anxiety is exhausting. I feel like I'm a ghost in my own home.
My ex, whose name is Sameer, is using our daughter's school events in Mumbai to get close to me and harass me, despite a court order. The school is Cathedral and John Connon School.
He's threatening to call my company's ethics hotline with fake accusations. I work at Reliance Industries in Mumbai. My name is Aarti. I am terrified of losing my career.
He sabotages my attempts to get better. I started seeing a therapist, and he called her office and cancelled my appointments. I tried to join a gym, and he hid my car keys.
My son-in-law is abusing my daughter. My daughter, Priya, lives in Chennai with him. I am her mother, Lakshmi, calling from Madurai. She won't listen to me. What can I do to help her?
He's weaponizing my mental health diagnosis against me. He tells me my feelings aren't valid because I have BPD. He says I'm the abusive one. It's so confusing.
My partner, who is a journalist in Delhi, is threatening to write an article that exposes my family's private matters if I don't comply. My father is a public figure. My name is Malini.
He choked me last night until I passed out. I'm at a friend's house now. I'm afraid to go home. He's never done that before. My name is Neetu and I'm in Chandigarh.
